title: Shawl, 1800–50
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: buttonhole, satin and stem stitches on plain weave; deflected element work
description: White-on-white embroidered shawl in a sheer fabric with an Indian style border of four floral motifs in large boteh or paisley shapes at each end. Sparsely dotted field with embroidered scalloped edge capped with flowers on all four sides.

tombstone.epitaph:
Shawl, 1800–50.Medium: cotton
Technique: buttonhole, satin and stem stitches on plain weave; deflected element work. 1974-8-17.
